products.name: One Netbook Game Console
products.longTitle: One Netbook ONEXPLAYER Game Console PC 8.4 Inch Pocket Computer i7-1165G7 16G RAM 1TB SSD IPS Touch Screen Windows 10 US Plug
products.description: CPU: Intel® Core™ i7-1165G7 Processor  The extremely capable processor allows users of all nature to be it the gamers or designers, to use it to its full potential.  GPU: Intel® Iris® Xe Graphics  On-processor graphics with shared video memory provide high image quality with basic photo editing and casual gaming.  16GB + 1TB SSD  16GB DDR4 offers a fast read and writes speed which allows games and programs to run smoothly. 1TB is sufficient for the average user's data storage.  8.4" 2.5K 100% sRGB IPS Screen with high 2560*1600 Resolution   ONEXPLAYER utilizes the 2.5K display, which offers vivid experiences for watching videos and browsing the Web.  15300mAh Large Battery  Use this laptop all day and night on one charge.  Support WiFi 6  It was equipped with Intel WiFi 6 network module, support WiFi 6 802.11ax protocol.  Windows 10 OS  Equipped with the latest genuine Windows 10 operating system with up to date software updates.

products.name: Midea M7 Pro
products.longTitle: Midea M7 Pro Robot Vacuum Cleaner 4000Pa Strong Suction Vibrating Mopping LDS Navigation 5200mAh Battery 150Mins Runtime APP Intelligent Control - Black
products.description: High-frequency vibration mopping the floor, powerfully clean dirt. 500 high-frequency vibrations per minute to wipe the floor.  4000PA strong suction, Use Nidec BLDC advanced motor.  Bilateral brush design, It is easier to gather dust.  The new LDS laser high flight system, Scan the room, build the room ground, Intelligently plan the best path.  APP intelligent control, WIFI remote control.  Automatically identify steps, 3000+ escape solutions, automatically identify obstacles.  Long working hours for 150 minutes, 5200mAh large capacity battery.  Three-layer dust filter, Nylon mesh + sponge + HEPA filter.
